DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study assess feasibility mindfulness-based stress reduction ( MBSR ) adult type multiple sclerosis . The secondary objective : 1 ) Explore ability MBSR improve perceive stress quality life compare education control group ; 2 ) Explore durability effect MBSR one year .
DOC.criteria: Men woman 18 year age old Definite relapse remitting , secondary progressive , primary progressive MS revise McDonald criterion ; Expanded Disability Severity Scale ≤ 8 baseline ; Stable MS disease modifying , anxiolytic , antidepressant medication three month prior baseline visit ; Mild moderate stress define score ≥ 10 Perceived Stress Scale screening ; Ability read write English ; Willingness provide informed consent comply study activity , include weekly MBSR session daily practice weekly Education Control class . MBSR cognitive behavioral therapy training within last 5 year ; Current regular meditation yoga practice ( weekly often ) ; MS exacerbation within 30 day Baseline Visit ; MiniMental Status Examination ( MMSE ) score ≤ 26 Screening Visit ; Active suicidal ideation ( Beck Depression Inventory ) Screening Visit ; Reported medically record diagnosis current serious psychological disorder depression anxiety ; Other current lifethreatening severely disable physical disorder ; Positive pregnancy urine test Baseline woman plan pregnancy study period ( contraception require ) ; Cancer , basal squamous skin cancer ; Inability unwillingness individual legal guardian/representative give write informed consent .
